Scripts.OnLoad: self.__dark = true if self:IsEnabled() ~= 1 then self:SetAlpha(0.5) end
if self:IsEnabled() ~= 1 then self.NormalTexture:SetAlpha(0.5) self.CheckedTexture:SetAlpha(0.5) self.Text:SetTextColor(0.45490196078431, 0.46274509803922, 0.47058823529412) end
Scripts.OnShow: if self:IsEnabled() == 1 then self.NormalTexture:SetAlpha(1) self.CheckedTexture:SetAlpha(1) self.Text:SetTextColor(1, 1, 1) else self.NormalTexture:SetAlpha(0.5) self.CheckedTexture:SetAlpha(0.5) self.Text:SetTextColor(0.45490196078431, 0.46274509803922, 0.47058823529412) end

Scripts.OnLoad: local height = self:GetHeight() self.Left:SetSize(height, height) self.Right:SetSize(height, height) self.Thumb:SetSize(height, height)
Scripts.OnSizeChanged: self.Left:SetSize(arg2, arg2) self.Right:SetSize(arg2, arg2) self.Thumb:SetSize(arg2, arg2)

Scripts.OnEnter: if ( self.hasArrow ) then GlueDark_ToggleDropDownMenu(self, self:GetParent():GetID() + 1, self.value); else GlueDark_CloseDropDownMenus(self:GetParent():GetID() + 1); end if self:GetParent().displayMode == "MENU" then self.MenuHighlight:Show() else self.Highlight:Show() end GlueDark_DropDownMenu_StopCounting(self:GetParent());
Scripts.OnLeave: if self:GetParent().displayMode == "MENU" then self.MenuHighlight:Hide() else self.Highlight:Hide() end GlueDark_DropDownMenu_StartCounting(self:GetParent());

Scripts.OnLoad: self.HandlesGlobalMouseEvent = function(this, buttonID, event) return event == "GLOBAL_MOUSE_DOWN" and buttonID == "LeftButton" end
Scripts.OnEnter: local parent = self:GetParent() if parent.fullWidthButtonHitRect then local script = parent:GetScript("OnEnter") if script then script(parent) end end
Scripts.OnLeave: local parent = self:GetParent() if parent.fullWidthButtonHitRect then local script = parent:GetScript("OnLeave") if script then script(parent) end end
